official.name: pyroll-wusatowski-spreading
official.description: Provides Wusatowski's spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-roux-spreading
official.description: Provides Roux' spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-sparling-spreading
official.description: Provides Wusatowski's spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-sander-spreading
official.description: Provides Sander's spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-hill-spreading
official.description: Provides Hill's spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-marini-spreading
official.description: Provides Marini's spreading model.

official.name: pyroll-ring-model
official.description: Provides a basic interface for inhomogeneous modelling with gradients in radial direction (from core to surface).

official.name: pyroll-ring-model-thermal
official.description: Provides thermal model based on the ring model approach.

official.name: pyroll-integral-thermal
official.description: Provides an integral approach for thermal modelling.

official.name: pyroll-zouhar-contact
official.description: Provides the contact area estimation by Zouhar.

official.name: pyroll-hensel-force-torque
official.description: Provides the roll force and roll torque empirical approach by A. Hensel.

official.name: pyroll-lippmann-mahrenholz-force-torque
official.description: Provides the roll force and roll torque calculation by Lippmann and Mahrenholz.

official.name: pyroll-sims-power-and-labour
official.description: Provides the power and labour calculations from R.B. Sims.

official.name: pyroll-karman-force-torque
official.description: Provides the roll force and roll torque calculation by solving von Karmans differential equation.

official.name: pyroll-freiberg-flow-stress
official.description: Provides the Freiberg flow stress approach and a material database.

official.name: pyroll-shida-flow-stress
official.description: Provides the Shida flow stress model.

official.name: pyroll-misaka-flow-stress
official.description: Provides the Misaka flow stress model.

official.name: pyroll-lee-flow-stress
official.description: Provides the Lee flow stress model.

official.name: pyroll-mauk-gottschling-flow-stress
official.description: Provides the Mauk and Gottschling flow stress model.

official.name: pyroll-hitchcock-roll-flattening
official.description: Provides the roll force correction through flattening by J. Hitchcook adapted by Bohm and Flaxa.

official.name: pyroll-lendl-equivalent-method
official.description: Provides the equivalent method from A.E. Lendl.

official.name: pyroll-work-roll-elastic-deformation
official.description: Provides the calculation of elastic work roll deformation by matrix method.

official.name: pyroll-neutral-point-estimator
official.description: Provides a collection of neutral point approximations.

official.name: pyroll-tension-spreading-interaction
official.description: Provides the empirical model of Dobler to include the effect of interstand tensions.

official.name: pyroll-pillar-model
official.description: Provides a descritized analyse of material flow as well as local forming values.

official.name: pyroll-stationary-thermal-analysis-work-roll
official.description: Provides a thermal analysis of roll cooling.

official.name: pyroll-gripping-analysis
official.description: Provides a gripping analysis by providing a bite-angle.

official.name: pyroll-elastic-mill-spring
official.description: Provides the gaugemeter equation for elastic mill feedback.

official.name: pyroll-jmak-recrystallization
official.description: Provides change in austenite grain size and strain according to dynamic, metadynamic and static recrystallization..

unofficial.name: pyroll-community-notebook
unofficial.description: Provides a notebook styled for PyRolL power users developed by G. Rothenbucher and M.Molter.
